Paper.Title: Ivaldi, S. and Fumagalli, M. and Randazzo, M. and Nori, F. and Metta, G. and Sandini, G. (2011). Computing robot internal/external wrenches by means of inertial, tactile and F/T sensors: theory and implementation on the iCub . Proc. of the 11th IEEE-RAS International Conference on Humanoid Robots - HUMANOIDS'11. Bled, Slovenia.
Paper.Abstract: iDyn - GPL dynamics library, whole body dynamics of iCub

Paper.Title: Berret, B. and Ivaldi, S. and Nori, F. and Sandini, G. (2011). Stochastic optimal control with variable impedance manipulators in presence of uncertainties and delayed feedback. Proceedings of the 2011 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems - IROS 2011. San Francisco, CA, USA.
Paper.Abstract: Variable impedance control on the iCub arm

Paper.Title: Randazzo M., Fumagalli M., Nori F., Natale L., Metta G. and Sandini G. (2011) A comparison between joint level torque sensing and proximal F/T sensor torque estimation: implementation on the iCub. Proceedings of the 2011 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems - IROS 2011. San Francisco, CA, USA.
Paper.Abstract: Joint torque sensors, proximal Force/Torque sensors, iCub arm v2

Paper.Title: Pattacini U., Nori F., Natale L., Metta G. and Sandini G. (2010) An Experimental Evaluation of a Novel Minimum-Jerk Cartesian Controller for Humanoid Robots, IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems - IROS 2010. Taipei, Taiwan.
Paper.Abstract: iKin - GPL kinematics library, inverse kinematics of iCub
